titles.title: Improving Care in Rural America Reauthorization Act of 2025
Improving Care in Rural America Reauthorization Act of 2025
Improving Care in Rural America Reauthorization Act of 2025
A bill to reauthorize certain programs regarding rural health care.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions. Reported by Senator Cassidy without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 153.
